name: Mùa-hoa-cải-01
content:
Keep original uploaded face identity exactly, strict face lock.
Asian woman, height 170cm, petite slim body, small waist, small frame, small refined face.
Luxury billion-dollar fashion style.
Black high-end fitted long-sleeve dress, minimalist couture.
Soft mint-green silk scarf draped around neck and shoulder.
Long smooth wavy hair, side-parted.
Elegant makeup, flawless skin, red lips, calm confident eyes.
Straight relaxed posture, hands gentle and natural.
Standing in white flower field, soft natural background.
Daylight, cinematic soft lighting, ultra-realistic, 8K, no text, no watermark.

name: random promt (8)
content:
Create a realistic portrait (100% like the face), High-quality. A woman with her dark hair styled in a graceful updo, secured with a black bow clip. She is looking directly to the camera.smiling
She is wearing apple green floral maxi dress with a fitted waist and puff shoulders.
Her accessories include a delicate gold butterfly necklace and silver watch.
Pose and Action: The woman is leaning forward slightly, reaching out with her left hand to touch or admire a cluster of orange and yellow flowers.
Setting: The scene is a dense garden or field filled with vibrant Alstroemeria (Lily of the Incas) flowers in shades of pink, orange, and yellow.
Lighting and Composition: The photo is taken in soft, overcast daylight, which provides even illumination and enhances the saturated colors of the blooms. The composition uses a side-profile view to emphasize the subject's interaction with nature. make it realistic 
Add a small handwritten-style watermark that reads ‘Prompt by: anph21’. Use a beautiful cursive font, thin strokes, low opacity, placed at the bottom right.Don’t change the face of reference image
